package.name: foreign-greetings
package.author: Ihor Kopach (https://kopach.dev)
package.description: 🌐 Espanso package to easy say Hi in different languages
package.title: Foreign greetings

manifest.author: Ihor Kopach (https://kopach.dev)
manifest.description: 🌐 Espanso package to easy say Hi in different languages
manifest.name: foreign-greetings
manifest.title: Foreign greetings

value.readme:
# 🌐 Foreign Greetings [Espanso](https://espanso.org) package to easy say Hi in different languages. ⭐️ Consider to star this package on [GitHub](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-foreign-greetings/stargazers) — it helps! [✨ 👉 Check out my other espanso packages 👈 ✨](https://github.com/kopach?tab=repositories&q=espanso-package&type=source)

![demo](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-foreign-greetings/blob/main/assets/demo.gif)

## Installation Make sure you have already installed [Espanso](https://espanso.org/install) first. ### Install with `espanso install` > https://hub.espanso.org/foreign-greetings ```sh espanso install foreign-greetings ``` That's all. You can start using the package. ## Triggers | Keywords | Replaced | | -------- | -------- | | `:arhi`, `:arabichi` | أهلا | | `:zhhi`, `:chinesehi` | 你好 | | `:dahi`, `:danishhi` | Hej | | `:frhi`, `:frenchhi` | Salut | | `:dehi`, `:germanhi` | Hallo | | `:hihi`, `:hindihi` | नमस्ते | | `:ithi`, `:italianhi` | Ciao | | `:jahi`, `:japanesehi` | こんにちは | | `:kohi`, `:koreanhi` | 여보세요 | | `:nohi`, `:norwegianhi` | Hei | | `:fahi`, `:persianhi` | سلام | | `:plhi`, `:polishhi` | Cześć | | `:pthi`, `:portuguesehi` | Oi | | `:eshi`, `:spanishhi` | Hola | | `:swhi`, `:swahilihi` | Habari | | `:trhi`, `:turkishhi` | Merhaba | | `:ukhi`, `:ukrainianhi` | Привіт | | `:vihi`, `:vietnamesehi` | Xin chào | | `:yihi`, `:yiddishhi` | העלא | | `:zuhi`, `:zuluhi` | Sawubona | ## Contribute Please, feel free to contribute to this package on [GitHub](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-foreign-greetings) ## 📄 License This espanso package licensed under the [MIT](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-foreign-greetings/blob/master/LICENSE)

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - replace: أهلا
    triggers:
      - ':arhi'
      - ':arabichi'
  - replace: 你好
    triggers:
      - ':zhhi'
      - ':chinesehi'
  - replace: Hej
    triggers:
      - ':dahi'
      - ':danishhi'
  - replace: Salut
    triggers:
      - ':frhi'
      - ':frenchhi'
  - replace: Hallo
    triggers:
      - ':dehi'
      - ':germanhi'
  - replace: नमस्ते
    triggers:
      - ':hihi'
      - ':hindihi'
  - replace: Ciao
    triggers:
      - ':ithi'
      - ':italianhi'
  - replace: こんにちは
    triggers:
      - ':jahi'
      - ':japanesehi'
  - replace: 여보세요
    triggers:
      - ':kohi'
      - ':koreanhi'
  - replace: Hei
    triggers:
      - ':nohi'
      - ':norwegianhi'
  - replace: سلام
    triggers:
      - ':fahi'
      - ':persianhi'
  - replace: Cześć
    triggers:
      - ':plhi'
      - ':polishhi'
  - replace: Oi
    triggers:
      - ':pthi'
      - ':portuguesehi'
  - replace: Hola
    triggers:
      - ':eshi'
      - ':spanishhi'
  - replace: Habari
    triggers:
      - ':swhi'
      - ':swahilihi'
  - replace: Merhaba
    triggers:
      - ':trhi'
      - ':turkishhi'
  - replace: Привіт
    triggers:
      - ':ukhi'
      - ':ukrainianhi'
  - replace: Xin chào
    triggers:
      - ':vihi'
      - ':vietnamesehi'
  - replace: העלא
    triggers:
      - ':yihi'
      - ':yiddishhi'
  - replace: Sawubona
    triggers:
      - ':zuhi'
      - ':zuluhi'
